mapper.select: select b.*,bn.* from Branded b join Bankdetails bn on b.Bankdetailsid=bn.Bankdetailsid
mapper.sql: lmkbh, grzhbh, Bankdetailsid, brandedId, password, balance
mapper.insert:
insert into branded
lmkbh,
grzhbh,
Bankdetailsid,
brandedId,
password,
balance,
#{lmkbh,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{grzhbh,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bankdetailsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{brandedid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update branded
grzhbh = #{grzhbh,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Bankdetailsid = #{bankdetailsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brandedId = #{brandedid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where lmkbh = #{lmkbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update branded set grzhbh = #{grzhbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Bankdetailsid = #{bankdetailsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brandedId = #{brandedid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where lmkbh = #{lmkbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}
